text: Muminagana, tomara allahara sahayyakari haye ya'o, yemana isa ibane-mariyama tara sisyabargake balechila, allahara pathe ke amara sahayyakari habe? Sisyabarga balechilah amara allahara pathe sahayyakari. Atahpara bani-isara'ilera ekadala bisbasa sthapana karala ebam ekadala kaphera haye gela. Yara bisbasa sthapana karechila, ami taderake tadera satrudera mokabelaya sakti yogalama, phale tara bijayi hala.
